summary: Back in Whitestone in Tal’Droei, Percy wakes up in a cold sweat, a burning sensation all over his body, a blast explosion...

summary:
My favorite thing in any article about Critical Role is the credits they use for the cast: 
I just love the idea of someone...
body:
My favorite thing in any article about Critical Role is the credits they use for the cast:

I just love the idea of someone scanning the casts’ IMDb pages and trying to pick out their biggest credit (and chosing Rick and Morty for Laura 😂)

summary: Just had to post this photo by @katofdiamonds (IG) that they so kindly tagged of me and my boyfriend in their story! I worked so...
body:
Just had to post this photo by @katofdiamonds (IG) that they so kindly tagged of me and my boyfriend in their story! I worked so hard to finish his Fjord costume in time for Emerald City Comic Con, so I’m glad to have such a good shot of us together.

Now on to do improvements on Jester…

Jester: Me (@kickpunchcosplay IG; @nott-calebthewizard Tumblr)

Fjord: Evan (not on Tumblr or IG; costume by me)

Photo: @katofdiamonds IG

blog.name: night-filled-mountain
blog.description:
“Each atom of that stone, each mineral flake of that night-filled mountain, in itself forms a world. The struggle itself toward the heights is enough to fill a man's heart. One must imagine Sisyphus happy.”

-Albert Camus, “The Myth of Sisyphus”

summary: Look, I had already read the post about Yasha almost killing Caleb in the same way Molly was killed, but actually watching that...
body: Look, I had already read the post about Yasha almost killing Caleb in the same way Molly was killed, but actually watching that moment where she raises her sword over his unconscious body was viscerally horrifying. Took me straight back to watching c2e26 live, and I could just hear Matt’s Lorenzo voice echoing in my head. Yeesh.

reblog.comment: Look, I had already read the post about Yasha almost killing Caleb in the same way Molly was killed, but actually watching that moment where she raises her sword over his unconscious body was viscerally horrifying. Took me straight back to watching c2e26 live, and I could just hear Matt’s Lorenzo voice echoing in my head. Yeesh.

trail.content_raw: Look, I had already read the post about Yasha almost killing Caleb in the same way Molly was killed, but actually watching that moment where she raises her sword over his unconscious body was viscerally horrifying. Took me straight back to watching c2e26 live, and I could just hear Matt’s Lorenzo voice echoing in my head. Yeesh.
trail.content: Look, I had already read the post about Yasha almost killing Caleb in the same way Molly was killed, but actually watching that moment where she raises her sword over his unconscious body was viscerally horrifying. Took me straight back to watching c2e26 live, and I could just hear Matt’s Lorenzo voice echoing in my head. Yeesh.

body:
Critical Role Live

Hey guys, for the people able to purchase a ticket to Gen con or for the LA live event, what was the cost range for the tickets?

Im from another country and its my dream to assist to a live show so I want to start saving for future events, so if you know were can I gwt this info or if you have the prices for past events I’d really appreciate the help.

Thanks fam!

summary: Figure skating/dancing au where Veth and Yeza know each other but work solo until their managers pair them up together to try...
question: Figure skating/dancing au where Veth and Yeza know each other but work solo until their managers pair them up together to try and have them do something fun and different that could land them more style points. Neither is too good as actually figure skating, being voted out or whatever on the second or third round, but they manage somehow to maybe win in the end race, whatever the fuck, the final competition?
answer:
the entirety of my very very limited knowledge on figure skating comes from the game “figure skater” for the nintendo DS, so. dont expect a lot of technical details

  • (do figure skaters have managers? coaches? someone who understands figure skating please feel free to do this better)
  • both of them are, ironically, from the same town (felderwin) but they never really interacted
  • veth moved to trostenwald after a while for work reasons, while yeza stayed in felderwin
  • anyway, they’re locally popular, have done some interviews, veth does a lot of charity work with anti-bullying charities,
  • and veth’s manager suggests a Big (tournament? game? competition??) Event to raise money for her favorite charity
  • however, some idiot mentioned veth would partner up with Other Local Favorite yeza [last name here] and now the press is running with it
  • when they contact him though, thankfully he’s down
  • it gets to be a whole big thing, and both of their managers keep pushing them to do more and more intricate things
  • but then one time, while they’re practicing, veth’s clumsiness shows itself at the worst possible time and she very nearly breaks a leg
  • she’s rushed to the hospital, just to be sure, and this is when 1) yeza realizes his little crush is maybe a little bigger than first assumed, and 2) they really need to fix this routine because theres no way they’ll pull it off
  • neither of them are olympic level skaters, y’know
  • so, it turns out she’s not seriously injured, just needs to ice it for a while
  • and yeza shows up in her hospital room with flowers and hot chocolate, and asks her on a date
  • their first date is in a hospital “cafeteria” complete with a walk through the hospital gift shop
  • (nerds)
  • she’s let out the next day, and they decide to combine their Signature moves into a simple, but yet moving routine
  • it’s very sweet, the local news fawns
  • (they get married in the winter, and go skating on lakes, and when luke is born, he learns to skate not long after he walks)

blog.name: flyboyelm
blog.title: FlyboyElm Art Blog
blog.description: Aiconx->flyboyelm Game artist from Sweden. Drawing a bunch of DnD stuff mostly (@flyboy_elm on Twitter)

summary: I was somewhat jealous of the cast of Critical Role and their fancy game table. I wanted something for dedicated gaming but...
body:
I was somewhat jealous of the cast of Critical Role and their fancy game table. I wanted something for dedicated gaming but couldn’t afford anything close to what I had in mind. So me and my wife decided to build our own. Let me know what you all think!

Decided to name it the Monstah because that’s the only way I knew how to describe it in one word.

Not sure who to credit this image to but Pike’s enthusiasm and joy is what I feel right now.

reblog.comment:

Not sure who to credit this image to but Pike’s enthusiasm and joy is what I feel right now.

summary: I'm sorry you couldn't get those tickets!! Its not dumb to be sad about it :(
question: I'm sorry you couldn't get those tickets!! Its not dumb to be sad about it :(
answer:
Yeah, no you’re right, it’s not dumb! It’s valid and all that, and I’m still disappointed, but still hopeful I can get resales. Never gotten a resale ticket before, so here’s hoping this liveshow will be my first. 

If any of you know or come across someone who is selling a ticket to the critical role liveshow at gencon, please let me know! I Am Willing To Pay
